mapper.sql: id, areaId, avgPrice, createTime, dateTime, flg, industry, mids, sales, salesNums, tradeCode, tradeId, tradeName, mcc
mapper.select: SELECT td.id, td.areaId, a.areaName, td.tradeId, td.tradeCode, td.tradeName, td.dateTime, td.industry, td.sales, td.salesNums, td.mids, td.avgPrice, td.flg, td.createTime, td.mcc FROM trade_data td, area a

SELECT td.id, td.areaId, a.areaName, td.tradeId, td.tradeCode, td.tradeName, td.dateTime, td.industry, td.sales, td.salesNums, td.mids, td.avgPrice, td.flg, td.createTime, td.mcc FROM trade_data td, area a
mapper.insert: insert into trade_data (id, areaId, avgPrice, createTime, dateTime, flg, industry, mids, sales, salesNums, tradeCode, tradeId, tradeName, mcc) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avgprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mids,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sales,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{salesnums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update trade_data
areaId = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
